RunConfig.UserInput: I need a conveyor belt system for sorting boxes. Create the following conveyour belt line:3 Straight Conveyour Belts, name "StartBelt", "Belt2", "Belt3".1  counter clockwise Curve, name "Curve1".2 Straight Conveyour Belts, name "Belt4", "Belt5".1 Switch Sorter, name "Sorter1".3 Straight Conveyour Belts, name "Belt6", "Belt7", "Belt8".1 Switch Sorter, name "Sorter2".1 Straight Conveyour Belt, name "Belt9".1 Switch Sorter, name "Sorter3".1 Straight Conveyour Belt, name "End4".
